subject: Wire session_start.ts to sync GitHub issues
description:
Wired session_start.ts to use syncFromGitHub() instead of duplicated manual sync.

Evidence:
- `hooks/src/hooks/session_start.ts:22`: `import { syncFromGitHub } from '../github/task_source_sync.js';`
- `hooks/src/hooks/session_start.ts:751`: `const result = syncFromGitHub();`
- Verification: Replaced ~50 lines of duplicated sync logic with single function call
activeForm: Wiring session start to GitHub sync
